CV

General Information

Full Name Mingzhi Liu
Date of Birth 14th Feb. 1996
Languages Chinese, English

Education

  • 2021-2025
    Ph.D.
    Karolinska Institutet, Stockholm, Sweden
    • Supervisor: Dr. Margareta Wilhelm, Karolinska Institutet
    • Co-Supervisor: Prof. Johan Holmberg, Karolinska Institutet & Umeå Universitet
    • Ph.D. Project:
      • Title: Modelling neuroblastoma using reprogrammed patient-derived stem cell
      • Aim: Develop new in vitro and in vivo models to study the origin and progression of neuroblastoma
      • Methods: iPS culture, in vitro differentiation, cell model, in utero injection, chimera generation, IHC, single-cell omics, etc.
  • 2018-2020
    Master's Degree of Medical Science in Biomedicine
    Karolinska Institutet, Stockholm, Sweden
  • 2014-2018
    Bachelor's Degree of Science in Biological Sciences
    Southwest University, Chongqing, China PR
